name: The Dancer Knight
description:
Dance until the end of the night ! welcome to

The Dancer knight is a frenetic rhythm game created during the Ludum Dare 41 ! You embodied Knight, a knight who leaves in a dungeon to eliminate the Boss who claims to be more fabulous than him ! It is up to you to prove him he is wrong with a dance step and a sword in the belly.

HOW TO PLAY :

- The arrows on the keyboard

Credits :

- Axel Louarn : Game Designer, 2D Animator

- Gregoire Castelain : Game Design, Rhythm Mapping

- Morrigane Haudry : 2D Animator

- Nathan Coisne : Sound Designer, Rhythm Mapping

- Vincent Dziurla : Developer
